answers.answer: Hi there...im not in your situation but i suggest you call your doc or midwife...let them know...because from what i know,those could be signs of preeclampsia...

I was like that w my first pregnancy but never ended up w preclamsia .. i even drank water 24/7 cut down my salt everything .. put ur feet up every chance u get my feet and legs would swell so muchwhen i walked i felt like they were just going to split apart .. call ur dr asap let them kno whats going on they will prolly wanna check urine and bp to see whats going on my dr kept a close eye on me

question: So i have been getting headaches through out the day. I haven't thought much about them because I have been working and dealing with rude people. But yesterday I was at home and I had a sudden onset of mass swelling in my feet ankles and legs to the point it hurt to walk. Has anyone else had this? I am borderline high blood pressure. And i am worried about getting preeclampsia at only 24 weeks.
title: Headache now sudden swelling!
